name: برنده باد / 風 カッター / Shamshir Katana hybrid
description:
A blade so sharp it could cut trough wind. a relic inspired by merging of two cultures. probably existed in an alternate reality where apes ruled over the earth and samurais were mutant mushrooms.

Imagine if samurais and immortal legion tried to create a combined army. This sword is the result of their both blacksmiths, creating a unique sword taking inspiration from both shamshir and katana. The grip is wrapped like katana but the guard is more like a Hakhamaneshi sword. The habaki (blade collar) is carved with a "Botejeghe" also known as "paisley" design, showing a cypress tree as a symbol of life and eternity. The word "Wind cutter" is also written with both kanji and mikhi alphabet. There's a "Zomorod" gem planted on the pommel of the sword.

The sharper the blade the easer it breaks, this sword takes a great swordsman to be wielded, otherwise it may break. 

There should have been a great catastrophe that two great kingdoms would want to combine their forces, what great evil were they going to face?

2K rendered 60FPS
